summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6034 for the improvement of West Stevens Street from 45th Avenue Southwest to approximately 350 feet west of 52nd Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81908, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
